body: When I bought emerald it said emerald+ get access to /kit random will it be fixed?
body_tagged: When I bought emerald it said emerald+ get access to /kit random will it be fixed?
title: Will kit random ever work?

replies.body: It should be, if it wasn't for the EULA but I'm not sure if the EULA is doing anything
replies.body_tagged: It should be, if it wasn't for the EULA but I'm not sure if the EULA is doing anything

replies.body:
Why does /kit random has to be only for Emerald and Diamond? Why not just for everyone? Because sometimes you can't decide on a kit and the time runs out so you get the worst kit.
Also, is just a simple Random method in Java. Just numerate every kit and do the random, if the number of the random is equals to the number of the kit then it will select that kit for that player. Easy fizzy ;T
replies.body_tagged:
Why does /kit random has to be only for Emerald and Diamond? Why not just for everyone? Because sometimes you can't decide on a kit and the time runs out so you get the worst kit.
